# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. I concur assignment Col. James H. Shaha as new commander U.S. Military Group, Bolivia. His background, professional skills, area knowledge and language proficiency meet the requirements I believe are necessary for new MILGP commander.

2. I appreciate the responsiveness of the Department of Defense in nominating Col. Shaha for this position.
Stedman
